source: ## This Notebook is used to update the LMS Data in 3 Months Intervals incrementaly
## Load Orginal and New Temp "Incremental Data"from Blob-storage

%%pyspark
#dboconsignment
dboconsignment_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dboconsignment_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dboconsignment_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboconsignment_temp")

dboconsignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboconsignment.parquet', format='parquet')
dboconsignment.createOrReplaceTempView("dboconsignment")

#dboLoads
dboLoads_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dboLoads_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dboLoads_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLoads_temp")

dboLoads = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboLoads.parquet', format='parquet')
dboLoads.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLoads")

#dboorder
dboorder_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dboorder_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dboorder_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder_temp")

dboorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboorder.parquet', format='parquet')
dboorder.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder")

#dboparcel
dboparcel_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dboparcel_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dboparcel_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparcel_temp")

dboparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
dboparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparcel")

#dbotrack
dbotrack_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dbotrack_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dbotrack_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dbotrack_temp")

dbotrack = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbotrack.parquet', format='parquet')
dbotrack.createOrReplaceTempView("dbotrack")

#dboWaybill
dboWaybill_temp = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS_Incremental_Data/dboWaybill_7_Days.parquet', format='parquet')
dboWaybill_temp.createOrReplaceTempView("dboWaybill_temp")

dboWaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboWaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
dboWaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dboWaybill")
## Drop 3 Months of the current data

dboconsignment_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dboconsignment
WHERE CDate <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(CDate), -7) CDate FROM dboconsignment)

""")

dboconsignment_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dboconsignment_drop")

dboLoads_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dboLoads
WHERE Ldate <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(Ldate), -7) Ldate FROM dboLoads)

""")

dboLoads_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLoads_drop")

dboorder_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dboorder
WHERE HODate <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(HODate), -7) HODate FROM dboorder)

""")

dboorder_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder_drop")

dboparcel_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dboparcel
WHERE AcceptanceDate <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(AcceptanceDate), -7) AcceptanceDate FROM dboparcel)

""")

dboparcel_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparcel_drop")

dbotrack_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dbotrack
WHERE LastUpdate <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(LastUpdate), -7) LastUpdate FROM dbotrack)

""")

dbotrack_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dbotrack_drop")

dboWaybill_drop = spark.sql("""

SELECT *
FROM dboWaybill
WHERE Date <= (SELECT date_add(MAX(Date), -7) Date FROM dboWaybill)

""")

dboWaybill_drop.createOrReplaceTempView("dboWaybill_drop")
## Union Old data with the New Data

consignment = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboconsignment_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboconsignment_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboconsignment_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboconsignment_drop)

""")
consignment.createOrReplaceTempView("consignment")

Loads = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboLoads_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboLoads_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboLoads_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboLoads_drop)

""")
Loads.createOrReplaceTempView("Loads")

order = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboorder_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboorder_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboorder_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboorder_drop)

""")
order.createOrReplaceTempView("order")

parcel = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboparcel_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboparcel_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboparcel_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboparcel_drop)

""")
parcel.createOrReplaceTempView("parcel")

track = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dbotrack_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dbotrack_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dbotrack_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dbotrack_drop)

""")
track.createOrReplaceTempView("track")

Waybill = spark.sql("""

(SELECT *
FROM dboWaybill_drop
EXCEPT
SELECT * FROM dboWaybill_temp)
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM dboWaybill_temp
EXCEPT 
SELECT * FROM dboWaybill_drop)

""")
Waybill.createOrReplaceTempView("Waybill")

consignment = dboconsignment_drop.union(dboconsignment_temp)
consignment.createOrReplaceTempView("consignment")

Loads = dboLoads_drop.union(dboLoads_temp)
Loads.createOrReplaceTempView("Loads")

order = dboorder_drop.union(dboorder_temp)
order.createOrReplaceTempView("order")

parcel = dboparcel_drop.union(dboparcel_temp)
parcel.createOrReplaceTempView("parcel")

track = dbotrack_drop.union(dbotrack_temp)
track.createOrReplaceTempView("track")

Waybill = dboWaybill_drop.union(dboWaybill_temp)
Waybill.createOrReplaceTempView("Waybill")
## Write new Union File Back to Blobstorage

consignment.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dboconsignment_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

Loads.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dboLoads_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

order.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dboorder_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

parcel.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dboparcel_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

track.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dbotrack_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')

Waybill.write.parquet('/Unstructured Data/LMS_test/dboWaybill_7_Days.parquet/', mode='overwrite')
